column1: Kata Robata////Kata is tucked into a cramped shopping center on Kirby
column2: so parking can be a bit of a nightmare
column3: but is manageable if you don't go on a Friday or Saturday night. I sat at the sushi bar on both occasions because I enjoy a good show with my dinner and the activity going on behind the counter of this sushi bar is very entertaining. I'm sure the traditional seating is good
column4: but I'm all about the sushi bar.
